__e: He's going to Washington, isn't he?
Sir, you being in Washington, you haven't been around like me.
Too bad the whole city of Washington doesn't have one.
I want to call... Washington D. C... please.
Sorry, but can you tell me the shortest way to Washington, D.C.?
I came from Washington DC to talk to you.
We want you to get him to Washington... by Friday for the 8:00 rendezvous.
Well, I guess we uh ought a write to Washington. What do you think?
I'll just give The Washington Post a call.
Anybody got the number of The Washington Post?
I wasn't sure you were a Washington Post reporter.
The end of Washington for me.
I'm coming to Washington to have my baby!
But of course I need an order from Washington to do this.
First thing tomorrow, I'll call Washington... and get some outside help, okay?
But, uh, I have a friend, and he knows a guy in Washington. And I don't think they'll ever get me:
It's George Washington's birthday. We'II be stuck here.
